property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After James Logan enters play, search your deck for up to two ATTACHMENT support cards and put them into play attached to him. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust two characters, each with at least #, to choose and destroy a non-ANCIENT ONE character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 to change one of Brood of Yig's @ icons into # until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Drive Crazed Arsonist insane to choose and destroy a LOCATION support card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character goes insane, destroy that insane character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Focused Art Student enters play, draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: All characters in play lose their printed icons until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each of your characters committed to this story gains %.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After The Red-Gloved Man enters play, search your deck for a conspiracy story card and put it into play. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Attached character gains "Action: Pay 1 and sacrifice a character to draw 2 cards."

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Ferocious Dark Young enters play, put another copy of Ferocious Dark Young into play from your discard pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character. Attached character loses # # % % and gains @ @.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You can have both HEROIC and VILLAINOUS characters in play at the same time.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to an opponent's character. Forced Response: After attached character is put into its owner's discard pile, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 2 and place a card from your hand to the bottom of your deck to draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is NIGHT, neutral characters cannot commit to stories.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose one of your characters committed to a story. That character gains @ # for each character committed to that story until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Discard the top 4 cards of your deck. Then, add any 2 cards from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Action: Exhaust Machete to give attached character FAST and # # until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice Apprentice Monster Hunter to choose and wound a MONSTER character with printed skill 3 or lower.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Change one of Feathered Serpent's @ icons into # $ until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Drive Obsessive Playwright insane to return a TOME or ARTIFACT support card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice a CULTIST character to take control of a character with printed skill 2 or lower until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you play Erin Moirai, choose and ready an exhausted character or support card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust a { character to return an ARTIFACT or TOME support card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each of your characters committed to this story gains $.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Action: Exhaust attached character and return Crowbar to your hand to wound a character with skill 1 or lower.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Mi-Go characters get +1 skill for each face down card attached to Specimen Room. Action: Exhaust Specimen Room to take a character card in your opponent's discard pile and attach it face down to this card as a blank ATTACHMENT support card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust a MI-GO character to look at the top X cards of your deck and return them in any order. X is equal to that character's skill.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Veronica Frost is committed to a story, choose another one of your characters committed to that story. That character is immune to triggered effects until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Tattoo Artist is committed to a story, choose a character. That character gets +2 or -2 skill until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Trophy Room to attach a character card from a player's discard pile face down to it as a blank ATTACHMENT support card. Action: Exhaust Trophy Room to have a character get +1 skill for each face down card attached to it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the beginning of your story phase, Crazed Shoggoth must commit to a story chosen by your opponent, if able.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 and sacrifice Cursed Skull to choose an opponent. That opponent must sacrifice a character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your opponent has put a character into play due to a card effect this turn, reduce the cost to play Intervention by 2. Action: Put Intervention into play as an INVESTIGATOR character with 3 skill, WILLPOWER, and # # %. At the end of the phase, sacrifice Intervention.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Priest of Two Faiths commits to a story, choose an opponent's non-ANCIENT ONE character committed to the same story. That character does not count its icons until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a story card. Characters with printed skill 1 or lower cannot commit to this story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a SERPENT character. Attached character gains @ @. Action: Exhaust Stygian Idol to lower the cost of the next SERPENT character you play this phase by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 2 to have all of your opponent's characters lose WILLPOWER and all @ icons until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a character. That character gains @ @ @ $ until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After Swooping Byakhee enters play, each opponent must choose and discard 1 card from his hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character. Attached character loses % %.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play before committing characters to stories during your story phase. Action: During all % struggless this turn, the player who wins this struggle may choose and ready a character committed to the story for each % icon he won the struggle by.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 to have all STUDENT characters gain % until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each of your characters committed to this story gains #.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Drive a character you control insane to put into play from your hand a MONSTER character with printed cost 3 or less. Sacrifice that MONSTER character at the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Mi-Go Laboratory and sacrifice a non-MI-GO character to give all MI-GO characters +2 skill and $ until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Mi-Go Guard gains # for each MI-GO character in play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a MI-GO character. Action: Exhaust Mi-Go Scalpel to have attached character gain an icon of your choice for each of your MI-GO characters in play until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character with skill 2 or less. Attached character is considered to have a blank text box and cannot commit to stories.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach Bootlegging Operation to a LOCATION support card. Action: Exhaust attached LOCATION card to draw 1 card from the bottom of your beck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Place one revealed card in the discard pile, add one revealed card to your hand, and place one revealed card on the top of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 2 to give Sam Archer % untill the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Take one revealed support card and add it to your hand. Place the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 to change one of Degenerate Serpent Cultist's @ icons into $ until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 3 to force each opponent to choose and sacrifice a character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust 2 DEEP ONE characters to put a DEEP ONE character with printed cost 3 or less from your hand into play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Drive Renowned Sculptor insane to put an ARTIFACT or ITEM support card from your hand into play. Return that card to your hand at the end of the phase if it is still in play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After Wraith enters your discard pile from play, your opponent must discard 1 random card from his hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Field Research Station and pay 1 to choose a story. That story gains or loses an % struggle until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 and exhaust Derby Hall to return a STUDENT or FACULTY character to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After Museum Curator enters play, search the top 5 cards of your deck for a support card and put it into play. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each of your characters committed to this story gets +2 skill.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character. Attached character gains FAST and TOUGHNESS +2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Feasting Ghouls gets +1 skill and @ for each face down card attached to it. Action: Pay 1 to take a character from your opponent's discard pile and attach it face down to Feasting Ghouls as a blank ATTACHMENT support card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Optic Warehouse and pay 2 to choose a story. That story gains or loses a @ struggle until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After Smugglers enters play, place your hand on the bottom of your deck. Then, draw cards equal to the number of cards you placed on the bottom of your deck. Action: Exhaust Smugglers and pay 1 to draw 1 card from the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Opponents must play with their hands revealed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a CRIMINAL character you control. Action: Exhaust attached character to choose and exhaust a character with skill 2 or lower.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose an opponent. That opponent discards a card from the top of his deck for each character he controls.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you play Doppelganger from your hand, choose a non-unique character in play, X is equal to the printed cost of that character. Doppelganger becomes an exact copy of that character while that character is in play. If that character leaves play, return Doppelganger to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Cultist of the Key to choose a story. That story gains or loses an $ struggle until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is DAY, Border Patrol Guard gains # #.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Police Headquarters to choose and exhaust a CRIMINAL character.

property.value: Attach to a character you control. Action: Sacrifice Sledgehammer to choose and destroy a MONSTER or CREATURE character with printed skill 3 or lower.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust River of Serpents to choose a SERPENT character. That character gains @ @ until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Serpent characters gain @. Action: Change onf of Yig's @ icons into # # $ until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Drive Dangerous Inmate insane to choose a character with printed skill 2 or lower. That character goes insane.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Lower the cost to play Thing from Nightmare by 1 (to a minimum of 1) for each insane character in play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a { character you control. Action: Exhaust Cultist Journal Sketches to choose a VILLAINOUS character. Return that character to its owner's hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After you draw cards due to a card effect, Professor Smith gains $ % until the en of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust M.U. Museum of Natural History to choose and return an ARTIFACT support card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you put an ITEM or TOME support card into your discard pile from play, sacrifice Archaeological Dig Site to add that card to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each of your characters committed to this story gains FAST.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After you win a # struglle, exhaust a character you control with at least # to choose and wound a character committed to that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 and sacrifice a character to give Chupacabra # # # until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Attach up to 3 characters from your discard pile to one of your domains as resource.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose an opponent's non-ANCIENT ONE character committed to a story. Uncommit that character from that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Name a card. Your opponent reveals his hand. Your characters get +2 skill for each copy of the revealed card in your opponent's hand until the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a story. Add or remove a # struggle from that story until the end of the phase. Then, you may exhaust a character you control to return Blind Fighting to your hand instead of discarding it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 2 to choose and play a SPELL event card from your discard pile without paying its costs. Then, place that card on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: When a character you control is wounded, discard a character card from your hand to cancel all wounds to that character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a WEAPON or ITEM card in your discard pile and return it to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Play before committing characters to stories during your story phase. Action: During all # struggles this turn, the player who wins this struggle may wound an additional character committed to that story for each # he won the struggle by.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Attach to a character you control. Attached character gets +2 skill and gains # #.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice a non-SERPENT character to put a SERPENT character from your hand into play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: After a character is wounded as a result of a # struggle, wound all characters committed to that story.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust The Cave on the Hill to remove one of your characters from a story. Then, ready that character.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: All characters in play go insane.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If it is NIGHT, Fledgling Byakhee gains @ @ $.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Stone Calendar and discard any number of your success tokens in order to draw cards equal to the number of success tokens you discarded.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action; Exhaust Uneasy Translator to choose a character. That character gains +2 skill for each character in play from a different faction than it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 1 to remove Harry Houdini from a story he is committed to. Then, ready him.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each of your characters committed to this story gains @.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Disrupt: Cancel 1 wound to a character you control. Sacrifice that character at the end of the phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Pay 2 to put into play any number of DARK YOUNG characters from your hand and discard pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Choose a MI-GO character. That character gains % until the end of the phase.

property.value: Response: After a character enters your discard pile from play, pay 1 to return that character to your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Tattooed Thug gains WILLPOWER and # $ $ as long as there is a conspiracy story card in play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Look at the top 4 cards of your opponent's deck. Then, return them to the top of his deck in any order.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Forced Response: After Reckless Elder Thing is committed to a story, wound it.
